Israeli strike kills two Palestinian journalists in Gaza, officials sayAn Israeli air strike on a car near Rafah in southern Gaza on Sunday killed two Palestinian journalists who were out reporting, according to health officials in Gaza and the journalists' union there. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 12:28:55 GMT C4LOSH3UNBOQHMK54O4IXZIBKE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-strike-kills-two-palestinian-journalists-in-gaza-officials-say-2024-01-07/Reuters世界中东地区
Fire leaves nearly 7,000 Rohingya homeless in Bangladesh campA fire swept through a Rohingya refugee camp in southeastern Bangladesh in the early hours of Sunday, destroying about 800 shelters and rendering thousands homeless, officials said. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 11:56:11 GMT EWJ4N3VUHFP35EBJTM3USRQITQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fire-leaves-nearly-7000-rohingya-homeless-bangladesh-camp-2024-01-07/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
Italian foreign minister calls for formation of EU armyThe European Union should form its own combined army that could play a role in peacekeeping and preventing conflict, Italian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani said. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 09:14:22 GMT 2KLLT7FHGRO3PF4FQI63YDUO4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italian-foreign-minister-calls-formation-eu-army-2024-01-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Blinken presses Arab states to discuss the future of GazaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken was set to press Israel’s Arab neighbors on Sunday to take a future role in running Gaza as he tries to quell regional tensions amid Israel’s offensive against Palestinian Hamas militants in the strip. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 08:36:56 GMT 6CO3BNW6PFMZ7PTTG4JONJNXYU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinking-presses-arab-states-discuss-future-of-gaza-2024-01-07/Simon Lewis, Suleiman Al-Khalidi世界中东地区
North Korea vows military strike if any provocation, fires artillery roundsNorth Korea will launch a military strike immediately in response to any provocation, Kim Yo Jong, the sister and key ally of leader Kim Jong Un, said on Sunday, as it fired artillery shells near its border with the South for the third day in a row. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 07:43:38 GMT CFCMTEOPEJJUBDG3DCB2DSMYPU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-kim-yo-jong-vows-immediate-response-pro Vocation-kcna-2024-01-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan premier vows 'ceaseless' aid as snow hampers quake reliefJapan's prime minister vowed to provide "ceaseless" support to areas devastated by the New Year's Day earthquake as snow and sleet hampered rescue and relief efforts and local media reported that the disaster had now claimed at least 126 lives. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 06:33:49 GMT BAPZMNHEM5IAPKYEWXCH257UI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-premier-vows-ceaseless-aid-snow-hampers-quake-relief-2024-01-07/Kevin Buckland, Kiyoshi Takenaka世界亚太地区
Six Palestinians, Israeli police officer killed in West Bank clashesIsraeli forces killed six Palestinians in the occupied West Bank, the Palestinian health ministry said on Sunday, and an Israeli police officer was killed, Israeli officials said. China to sanction 5 US manufacturers over arms sales to Taiwan - ministryChina will sanction five U.S. military manufacturers in response to the latest round of U.S. arms sales to Taiwan, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Sunday. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 01:38:59 GMT T33CLIXP3RJ3NGOONLMYTVWTHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china-sanctions-5-us-manufacturers-over-arms-sales-taiwan-ministry-2024-01-07/Reuters世界
On Orthodox Christmas Putin vows to back soldiers who 'defend' RussiaPresident Vladimir Putin vowed on the eve of Orthodox Christmas to back soldiers who "with arms in hands" defend Russia's interests, ordering his government greater support of those who fight and calling on his people to be merciful and just. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 00:26:09 GMT CICEKLFGXFI33AETA3NIJMFZQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/orthodox-christmas-putin-vows-back-soldiers-who-defend-Russia-2024-01-07/Reuters世界欧洲

EU's Michel to run in election, will leave post mid-July, de Standaard reportsEU Council President Charles Michel will run in the election for European Parliament in June and will leave his post mid-July if he gets elected, he said in an interview with Belgian newspaper De Standaard published on Saturday.
